== Main Inclusion Report for zope3 ==

 0. ''Availability:'' 
** The package is available in universe, source is already in main.
 0. ''Rationale:'' 
** Zope3 is a new stable branch of the well-known python web application framework. 
** Schooltool and schoolbell depends on Zope3.
 0. ''Security:'' 
** Some issues in the past; upstream supports several stable releases.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** Needs to setup instances after install, which could be done through dzhandle utility from zope-common package (already in main).
** No bugs in "<nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/zope3|Debbugs]]</nowiki>"
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS and the Debian Policy.
** Standard debhelper packaging.
** zope3 and zope3-lib look like if they could be Arch:all.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** python2.4, zope-common (already in main)
